description:
The president from the Republic of Poliador arrives in Japan, and the Modern Crime Prevention Task Force are assigned to protect the embassy. After a body is found inside the building, the president and Daisuke are forced to the panic room.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: If Money Be Not Thy Servant, It Will Be Thy Master
Moshi Kane o Sonata no Meshitsukai to Shinagereba, Kane wa Sonata no Shujin to Naru Darou
Réduisez l`argent en servitude ou il vous gouvernera
もし金を汝の召使としなければ, 金は汝の主人となるだろう
